data.content: Sixth attempt: changed list-colors injection from group-scoped zstyle keys to a kno-context rule (`zstyle ':completion:*:*:kno:*' list-colors ...`) because zsh applies list-colors by completion context (group specificity is typically expressed inside the value), and kept zmodload -i zsh/complist to ensure color support. Also kept separator embedded in Other Commands header and command column right-padding for correct alignment.
